name: LycanQuest LD35
description:
The game embedded on this page is a *fixed* version. Do not do ratings based on this one. Download the standalone original compo version files below.

Controls:

Keyboard

Arrows - Move/Jump

Z - Attack

C - Shapeshift

Controller

D-Pad or Left Joystick - Move

A - Jump

B - Drop through One Way Platforms

Y - Transform
